entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:32 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:32 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
